sndlib.core.network
Class Meta

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.network.Meta

public final class Meta
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents meta information for a network and its demands

Author:
Christian Raack
See Also:
Network

Constructor Summary
Meta()
          Constructs a meta object.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getGranularity()
          Returns the granularity of the demands (over which time horizon has the demand been averaged)
 java.lang.String getOrigin()
          Returns the data origin (nework and or demands)
 java.lang.String getTime()
          Returns the point in time the demand has been taken

          Returns the demand value unit
